Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Peeters Vogel Wagemakers at a corporate retreat in Amsterdam. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Peeters Vogel Wagemakers is a seasoned professional with over 22 years of experience.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Peeters Vogel Wagemakers is currently divorced. His child is named Dekkers.
Education Background:
In 1999, Peeters graduated from VWO Dalton Den Haag with a secondary school diploma.
Peeters completed his university studies at Webster University Leiden in 2003.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 22 years, Peeters Vogel Wagemakers has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Peeters Vogel Wagemakers's first role was as a Aerospace Engineer at NLR - Netherlands Aerospace Centre, where he worked diligently from 2003 to 2008 to establish a strong reputation.
His subsequent role was as a Program Manager at Airbus Netherlands B.V., where he continued to grow professionally from 2010 till now.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 310000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Roosendaal, Almere and Zaandam, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.

Following the passing of his grandfather, a successful Neurosurgeon, he received an inheritance of 230000 EUR in 2010, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: In summary, Peeters has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
